title: Gruesome Newsom Invokes Christ for Evil Law
itunes:title: Gruesome Newsom Invokes Christ for Evil Law
description: California Governor Gavin Newsom launched a series of pro-abortion ads in multiple states across the country. If that wasn’t evil enough, he invokes the Bible, Holy Scripture, in the ads to justify the killing of unborn children. Jay, Jordan, and the Sekulow team have a lot to say about these disgusting displays. This and more today on Sekulow.
